title: Judt quote analysis of 20th century state econs

content.question: Directions: Answer all parts of the following question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable. Sources have been edited for the purposes of this exercise. Provide ONE piece of evidence that would support Judt’s argument regarding the creation of welfare states. Provide ONE piece of evidence that would support Judt’s characterization of political and economic conditions in the period 1960 to 2000. Briefly analyze ONE way in which Judt’s argument is a response to the political and intellectual trends in late-twentieth-century Europe

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
